remarks: Value of the binary topological product operation.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2015.)

txval.1 $e |- B = ran ( x e. R , y e. S |-> ( x X. y ) ) $.
txval $p |- ( ( R e. V /\ S e. W ) -> ( R tX S ) = ( topGen ` B ) ) $.
$d R x y $.
$d S x y $.
